description:
God, this boy is cute! Great smile, hazel green eyes, and a toned surfer body.
We had spotted Ritchie on the beach just after his nineteenth birthday, where he was surfing, tanning, and chasing girls. A college sophomore, he was taking a break for the summer to have some fun.
A week or so later, he came down for a visit. He was nervous and stiff at first, but after we got a hot load out of his cock he seemed more comfortable with us. A trip to the park for some posing opened him up a bit. There he told us about how he likes to fuck his girlfriend (who didn't know he was here doing this).
Apparently, his folks have money so I wasn't sure why he wanted to do a video. When I asked him, he said the idea of it excited him. You gotta love nineteen year olds!
title: Ritchie
